model.node

Class Canteen

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.node.Node
      • model.node.Canteen

  • public class Canteen
extends Node
    A class which represent a canteen with list of all the menu it has and its position on x and y in global position (GPS value).
    Since:
    1.4

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Canteen(double x, double y)
      Constructs and initializes a canteen at the (x,y) location.
      Canteen(double x, double y, int ID)
      Constructs and initializes a canteen at the (x,y) location with its ID.
      Canteen(Point P)
      Constructs and initializes a canteen at the Point location.
      Canteen(Point P, int ID)
      Constructs and initializes a canteen at the Point location with its ID.

             throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException

        Parameters:
